article_title: Space Photos of the Week: Rovers Taking Selfies—for Science
article_description: Instead of likes  these snapshots provide teams with vital information about how spacecraft are faring on interplanetary surfaces
article_content: When spacecraft leave the Earth they are destined to either land somehere  orbit something or fly by a planetary object  And one of the very first things NASA does when a spacecraft lands on another planet is to have it take a selfie  Let me see your wheels i   3235 chars
